===Noun===
{{ja-noun|がっきゅう い.いんちょう}}

# A [[class]] [[representative]], in the context of an elementary school or junior high school.
# {{lb|ja|anime|sort=かっきゅういいんちょう'}} A class representative, commonly depicted as a [[bespectacled]] [[girl]] (''[[meganekko]]'') or [[boy]] with a pushy albeit well-meaning attitude.
